title: Really weird issue with my ping!
body:
I used to have a stable average of 20 MS in league but now it appears to be going from 80 to 150 to 300 and lower and up and its NEVER stable which is weird.
The even weirder thing is that when I use my OBS to stream my ping in game turns to my normal average of 20 MS and is stable so I have no clue whatsoever as to why this is happening.

Help would be very appreciated if anyone knows what is up.

replies.body:
Even though the ping for OBS could be okay, the path your network is taking to get to the server could be having some issues.

I think a good first step to try out first would be to release or renew your IP and flush your DNS by following the steps on this [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq10).

If that doesn't work, our Tech team can take a closer look at the situation by[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

Keep me posted and let me know if this helps! :)
